title: Woe
content: Woe Very Rare 2~9 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6)+1 Bludgeoning Arcane Enchantment: You gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC and spell attack rolls. Arcane Vampirism: When the creatures affected by your spells fail any associated Saving Throws regain 1~4 hit points. Weapon Enchantment +1 Blight Main Hand OnlyTopple Bound Weapon The gentle tap-tap-tap of a staff on one sparked terror for all in Cazador's palace. It signalled an approaching storm,and all they could do was shrink
